title: Gingerbread Boys
ingredients: ['225g butter, softened', '300g caster sugar', '1 egg', '1 1/2 tablespoons orange zest', '2 tablespoons treacle', '375g plain flour', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/2 teaspoon ground cloves', '1/2 teaspoon salt']
